name: GOTAFE Learner's Portal
description: Guides users through the navigation of the 'Learner's Portal'

steps.title: Welcome to GOTAFE
steps.content: This 'Learner's Portal' is an introduction to everything you need to know about studying at GOTAFE.  Whenever you need help, you can come back to the Learner's Portal.

steps.title: Navigating
steps.content: Use these links to move from page to page.

steps.title: Studying with GOTAFE
steps.content: Here you'll find information, advice, guides and important documents.

steps.title: Your online profile
steps.content: Offers guides to online learning, student email, Office 365 and other student tools.

steps.title: Online learning help
steps.content: Visit this page for answers to 'Frequently Asked Questions' and a discussion forum where you can ask for help.

steps.title: Study help
steps.content: Has links to the GOTAFE library, free study help with an online tutor and a tool that will read your screen aloud for you.

steps.title: Search for your course
steps.content: When the time comes, your trainer will help you search for your course home.

steps.title: My Courses
steps.content: Remember the My Courses screen?  You can return here at any time.

steps.title: How do I find the Learner's Portal?
steps.content: Wherever you are, in any Course or Unit, you will find a link to the Learner's Portal at the bottom of every screen.

steps.title: Ready to get started?
steps.content: Select the 'Read more' button to read a welcome from our CEO.
